author: Suzanne Collins
review: A gripping tale of survival and rebellion in a dystopian society, where teenagers fight to the death in a televised spectacle.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
review: An enchanting adventure of Bilbo Baggins, filled with magic, dragons, and unexpected heroism, set in the beloved world of Middle-earth.

author: Paulo Coelho
review: A philosophical fable about following one's dreams and listening to the heart's desires, amidst a journey of self-discovery.

author: Dan Brown
review: A thrilling puzzle-filled adventure, blending art, history, and mystery, as symbologist Robert Langdon unravels a centuries-old secret.

author: Cormac McCarthy
review: A haunting post-apocalyptic journey of a father and son, navigating a desolate landscape while clinging to hope and humanity.

author: George Orwell
review: A chilling dystopian vision of a totalitarian future, where individuality is suppressed and truth is manipulated.
